    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getCircumscribedCircleCurvature(ILineString line, IDirectPosition point)
      Compute the curvature of a line in a given point, using the approximation of the radius of the circumscribed circle of the trinagle formed by the consecutive points around the given point.
      static double getCircumscribedCircleCurvature(ILineString line, IDirectPosition point, IDirectPosition pointBefore, IDirectPosition pointAfter)
      Compute the curvature of a line in a given point (and its neighbours), using the approximation of the radius of the circumscribed circle of the trinagle formed by the given three consecutive points.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
